buildings.name: Tavern
buildings.description: A cozy gathering place where adventurers can rest, recover, and enjoy hearty drinks that provide temporary bonuses.

buildings.name: Training Tower
buildings.description: A place to hone your skills and learn new abilities. Train your party members to unlock powerful combat techniques.

buildings.name: Armory
buildings.description: Equip your party with weapons and armor. Upgrade equipment using materials gathered from your adventures.

buildings.name: Slayers' Lodge
buildings.description: Accept bounties and hunt dangerous creatures for valuable rewards. Complete slayer tasks to earn special currency.

buildings.name: Lemon Stall
buildings.description: Lemvor's famous lemon stand. Purchase refreshing lemon-based treats and support the local citrus economy.

buildings.name: Alchemist's Shop
buildings.description: Purchase potions, elixirs, and consumables to aid your party in combat. Stock up before venturing into dangerous dungeons.
